Blessing of Cloudwalker: [Wild Swords] and [Heart Piercer] deal an additional 800% ATK of Ice DMG. [Heart Piercer] draws in enemies when triggered. [Heart Piercer] will be unleashed automatically when Blade Sanction reaches 0. Jade Knight will enter [Cloud Cut] mode when casting [Cloud Cutter]. Can stack 100 max, 8s duration. Triggering it again resets the duration. [Cloud Cutter] and [Heart Piercer]'s Ice DMG increases 1% per stack. No

Note

This build functions on 2 Ego signets: Shaft and Jade Moon. A 3rd Ego signet can be picked for Smoky Waft, and it's mainly for synergy with Eden2 to further have more SP Regen overflow and function alongside Withered Soil.

Hua - Signet of Vicissitude (1st Core)

#

Note

Ideal Order from F1-F7: Double Ego Start for Shaft and Jade Moon, then Hua Elem Breach F3, finish Hua 2nd Core by F4, either gamble for Broken Dream F5 or take Eden/Griseo door, go shop F6 and get Griseo Red/Yellow/Black or Eden TDM and Phys & Elem DMG. Kalpas TDM and Phys/Elem DMG can also be considered, and upgrade Hua Breach. Finish Eden 2nd Core by F7

Signet Priority
Old Dreams Again: Elemental Breach increases by 0.6% per second 1st
Long Trip: Total DMG increases by 1.0% per second. 40 stacks max. Taking DMG reduces 10 stacks. 2nd
Dark Garb No More: Elemental DMG increases by 0.8% per second 3rd
Nexus Signet 2: Suffering Mass
Broken Dream: When possessing Soldier's Remembrance, increase the maximum stack of normal Vicissitude signets by 20 Optional

Note

Getting Broken Dream is really helpful, as such, it's not a bad choice to try and gamble for her. You can also restart your run in order to get it if you don't mind.

Eden - Signet of Gold (2nd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Recitatif of Eden: Every 10 SP left boosts Total DMG by 3.0%. 1st
Recitatif of Creeks: Every 10 SP left boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 2.5%. 2nd
Recitatif of Good Wine: Restore 1.5 SP per second. 3rd
Recitatif of Fine Jade: Initial SP and max SP increase by 30. Optional 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Echo of Gold
Echo of Withered Soil: After lasting over 1s, Final Echo boosts SP cap by 50% and restores 1% SP per second until it ends. 1st

Note

Withered Soil is a good option to consider when you already have excessive SP Regen overflow, mainly with Apo2's SP Regen and Eden's Sp/s.

Aponia - Signet of Discipline (3rd Core)

#

Signet Priority
First, No Betrayal: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Basic ATK's Total DMG increases by 0.3% of Exhortation. Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill reduces 50% Exhortation. 1st
Third, No Brutality: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Valkyrie has bonus SP regen per second equal to 1% of Exhortation. Reaching 160 combo reduces 50% Exhortation. 2nd
Fifth, No Falsehood: Valkyrie starts with 70 bonus Exhortation. Whenever Exhortation is reduced, enemies take 25% bonus Total DMG for 5s. Can be refreshed. 3rd
Fourth, No Insolence: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Ultimate's Physical and Elemental DMG increases by 0.3% of of Exhortation. Using weapon skills reduces 50% Exhortation. (Jade Moon Only) 4th
Nexus Signet 2: You Shall Receive Disciplines' Blessing
You Shall Follow Good: You Shall Know Your Sins' Total DMG dealt increases 40% and increases Physical and Elemental Breach by 0.25% of Exhortation for 6s upon hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
You Shall Punish Evil: Enemies struck by You Shall Know Your Sins two or more times take 40% more Total DMG. 5 SP is restored when these enemies are hit by You Shall Know Your Sins. 2nd
You Shall Answer Prayers: Triggering You Shall Know Your Sins causes the Valkyrie to enter Penance for 8s. In Penance, the Valkyrie takes 30% less Total DMG and deals 40% more Physical and Elemental DMG to enemies. Valkyrie deals 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG to attacking enemies when hit; CD: 5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. Optional 3rd

Note

Basic ATK still wins in priority over Ultimate due to it being your main source of damage. Punish Evil is a good choice when u have Eden2 to further have SP regen overflow.

Kalpas - Signet of Decimation (4th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Blade, Grave and Scar: Every 100 HP loss boosts Total DMG by 1.0%. 1st
Bone, Blood and Ribbon: Every 100 HP loss boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 0.8%. 2nd
Path, Misfortune and Written Fate: Max HP increases by 25%. 3rd
Desireless, Mindless and Homeless: Losing HP boosts Total DMG taken by all enemies by 25% for 8s. Optional
Nexus Signet 2: Soldiers, Scissors, Spoils, and Slaughter

Note

Kalpas' TDM Taken on HP Loss should only be considered if you have BR.

Griseo - Signet of Stars (5th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Red & Hot: Using a weapon active taints enemies nearby with red paint for 8s and makes them take 25% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG (cannot stack). Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Yellow & Warm: Using an Ultimate taints enemies nearby with yellow paint for 8s and makes them take 30% bonus Total DMG. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Black & Dark: Every time an enemy is tainted, Valkyries deals 10% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG for 20s. 6 stacks max. 3rd
Blue & Cold: Triggering an Ultimate Evasion Skill taints enemies nearby with blue paint for 8s and reduces their Total DMG and Move Speed by 30%. Triggering it again resets the duration. 4th
Grey & Empty: Enemies stay tainted for 5s longer. Optional 5th
Nexus Signet 2: Faded Stars
Fallen Leaves: When yellow and blue taint triggers Blending along with an AoE ATK dealing 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself green for 15s, increasing Total DMG 20% for each taint in Faded Stars. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Petals in the Wind: When red and blue taint triggers Blending, enemies within 8m are dealt 1200%/500% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself purple for 15s, increasing the effect of red, yellow, and blue taint by 40%. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
A Flame Extinguished: When red and yellow taint triggers Blending you become tainted orange for 15s, triggering Time Fracture for 2.5s and reducing enemy Physical Defense 40% and Elemental Resist 15% for 10s; CD: 7s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 3rd

Note

You can choose to go for Eden2 as your next core after you're finished with Griseo2's Core if you want to have her Core before further pursuing Griseo2's Enhanceds.

Sakura - Signet of Setsuna (Felis Shop Signets)

#

Signet Priority
Bountiful Blossom: Koyo: Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill boosts Total DMG taken by all enemies by 30% for 8s. 1st
Bountiful Blossom: Botan: Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill boosts Total DMG by 40% for 8s. 2nd

Note

Sakura signets are better picked off from shop and nothing else.

Luna Kindred#

Quick Search: LK, Teri, Theresa

-- Loli Grandma arrives last

#

Boss to be chosen: Husk Mysticism, then Vill-V

Setup

#

Rank Difficulty Done Recommended Gear Clear Time Run
SSS Finality Hekate & Ely TB Dante M 20:58m (6.2 1st Half) https://youtu.be/fOl7ceUeRT0

Note

In regards to her downscalability, she has some interesting stigma alternatives and she doesn't necessarily need Hekate. Elysian Astra can be used if you like. Having higher ATK is what's important here.

Buff Load
Enemies hit by weapon active take 5% bonus total dmg for 5s 5
For every 60 hits, enemies take 3% more total dmg, capped at 15%. 10
Physical and Elemental dmg increases by 15% for 4s after triggering Ultimate evasion 10
Time slowed enemies take 8% bonus total dmg for 4s 5

Note

Updated for 6.4.

Time Remembrance Sigil FC Support Skill
Early Veil of Tears The Lonely Moon
Mid Rainbow of Absence / Mad King's Mask / Memory The Lonely Moon
Late Key to the Deep or Proof of Good and Evil The Lonely Moon
Time Support 1 Support 2
Early SN or LE BR
Mid SN BR
Late SN BR

Note

Can also use LE for early only instead of BR for Ultimate. Up to your preference, but afterwards it's BR for the remainder of the run.

Elysia - Signet of ■■

#

Signet Priority
Blessing of Penumbra Each Charged ATK only deals 140% ATK of Physical DMG, but every 4 consecutive Charged ATKs boost the speed of wielding the giant ax. Valkyrie gains a barrier with HP equal to 100% of her Max HP; when Sanguine Mark is below 50, every 3% Valkyrie HP will be converted to 1% barrier HP instead of Sanguine Mark cost Start
Blessing of Blood Feast Within the next 8s after Ultimate's final hit lands, each Charged ATK deals bonus Physical DMG equal to 1.5x the amount of current HP loss 1st
Blessing of Imprint Every 2 Charged ATKs that consume Sanguine Mark will enable the next Charged ATK that consumes Sanguine Mark to deal bonus Physical DMG equal to 0.5x the amount of current HP loss 2nd
Blessing of Immortality Triggered once at below 1% HP to deal Physical DMG equal to 1.5x the amount of current HP loss to surrounding enemies every 0.8s for 4s, during which Valkyrie will not die and restores 5% HP afterward. This effect's triggering chance will be reset after Valkyrie HP rises back to 33% No
Blessing of Thirst Lower HP enables higher HP recovery (max boost: 300%). If Valkyrie restores more than 10% HP within a short period of time, all enemies will be impaired for 10s (DEF -30%) No

Note

Penumbra + Blood Feast. Those 2 are required to make LK work. Imprint can also be picked up as 3rd Ego signet on the way to make the build stronger, especially once you get Pardo's HP Regen going on very strongly.

Pardofelis - Signet of Reverie (1st Core)

#

Note

Ideal Order from F1-F7: Bald for Ego Door along with Pardo Gacha to give you +999 coins, then grab Blood Feast from the Ego door. Proceed to grab Pardo's HP/SP Regen at F3 or one of the money-making signets, continue to F4 and finish Pardo2 by F5 with both Money-making signets and the HP/SP Regen signet. Go shop F6, grab Kalpas' TDM, Phys/Elem DMG and Max HP% or TDM Taken, Aponia's Basic and SP Regen or Ultimate and Hua's TDM. Finish Aponia 2nd Core by F7

Signet Priority
Flexible P&C: Every 100 Shiny Silvers obtained this round restore 1 HP and 0.1 SP. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s. 1st
Merchant's Philosophy: After finishing each floor, the number of currently owned Shiny Silvers grows by 10% for up to 100 (independent effect). 2nd
Shiny & Valuable: Enemy kills grant bonus Shiny Silvers. Non-boss enemies grant 5 each. Boss enemies grant each (independent effect). 3rd
Neighborhood Chatters: Every 100 Shiny Silvers obtained this round boost max HP by 25 and max SP by 1. 4th
Motto of Meow: Every 100 Shiny Silvers obtained this round boost Total DMG by 1%. Optional 5th
Back-Curled Tail: Every 100 Shiny Silvers obtained this round boost Physical and Elemental DMG by 0.8%. Optional 6th
Nexus Signet 2: Empty Illusions, Empty Fantasies:
My Dreams Will Come True: With 1/2/3 stacks of VIP Service, release Making Money every 15/10/5 seconds in an area around Valkyrie, dealing 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG and making enemies take 50% more Total DMG for 5s. This debuff will diminish to nothing over 5s. 1st
Improv Magic: Zeroing: 10% off shop items. A newly gained stack of VIP Service increases Total DMG by another 10%. 2nd
Snowy Paw: A newly gained stack of VIP Service lasts for 6 floors. Can gain 1 more stack of VIP Service at most on a shop visit. Optional 3rd

Note

Getting the Discount ASAP is pretty good if you can.

Kalpas - Signet of Decimation (2nd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Blade, Grave and Scar: Every 100 HP loss boosts Total DMG by 1.0%. 1st
Bone, Blood and Ribbon: Every 100 HP loss boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 0.8%. 2nd
Path, Misfortune and Written Fate: Max HP increases by 25%. 3rd
Desireless, Mindless and Homeless: Losing HP boosts Total DMG taken by all enemies by 25% for 8s. 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Soldiers, Scissors, Spoils, and Slaughter

Note

Between both Cores the choice isn't that impactful; 1st Core will give you some constant Periodic DMG but 2nd Core will give you a bit more HP from Pardo HP Regen doing its job filling it.

Aponia - Signet of Discipline (3rd Core)

#

Signet Priority
First, No Betrayal: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Basic ATK's Total DMG increases by 0.3% of Exhortation. Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill reduces 50% Exhortation. 1st
Third, No Brutality: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Valkyrie has bonus SP regen per second equal to 1% of Exhortation. Reaching 160 combo reduces 50% Exhortation. 2nd
Fifth, No Falsehood: Valkyrie starts with 70 bonus Exhortation. Whenever Exhortation is reduced, enemies take 25% bonus Total DMG for 5s. Can be refreshed. 3rd
Fourth, No Insolence: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Ultimate's Physical and Elemental DMG increases by 0.3% of of Exhortation. Using weapon skills reduces 50% Exhortation. Optional 4th
Nexus Signet 2: You Shall Receive Disciplines' Blessing
You Shall Follow Good: You Shall Know Your Sins' Total DMG dealt increases 40% and increases Physical and Elemental Breach by 0.25% of Exhortation for 6s upon hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
You Shall Answer Prayers: Triggering You Shall Know Your Sins causes the Valkyrie to enter Penance for 8s. In Penance, the Valkyrie takes 30% less Total DMG and deals 40% more Physical and Elemental DMG to enemies. Valkyrie deals 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG to attacking enemies when hit; CD: 5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
You Shall Punish Evil: Enemies struck by You Shall Know Your Sins two or more times take 40% more Total DMG. 5 SP is restored when these enemies are hit by You Shall Know Your Sins. 3rd

Note

Basic ATK is high priority to +3. Ultimate also good to consider +3.

Hua - Signet of Vicissitude (4th)

#

Signet Priority
No One To Share: Physical Breach increases by 0.6% per second. 40 stacks max. Taking DMG reduces 10 stacks. 1st
Long Trip: Total DMG increases by 1.0% per second. 40 stacks max. Taking DMG reduces 10 stacks. 2nd
Days Gone: Physical DMG increases by 0.8% per second. 40 stacks max. Taking DMG reduces 10 stacks. 3rd
Nexus Signet 2: Suffering Mass
Broken Dream: When possessing Soldier's Remembrance., increase the maximum stack of normal Vicissitude signets by 20 1st

Note

Broken Dream is good to consider to try and get.

Griseo - Signet of Stars (5th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Red & Hot: Using a weapon active taints enemies nearby with red paint for 8s and makes them take 25% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG (cannot stack). Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Yellow & Warm: Using an Ultimate taints enemies nearby with yellow paint for 8s and makes them take 30% bonus Total DMG. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Grey & Empty: Enemies stay tainted for 5s longer. 3rd
Blue & Cold: Triggering an Ultimate Evasion Skill taints enemies nearby with blue paint for 8s and reduces their Total DMG and Move Speed by 30%. Triggering it again resets the duration. 4th
Black & Dark: Every time an enemy is tainted, Valkyries deals 10% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG for 20s. 6 stacks max. Optional 5th
Nexus Signet 2: Faded Stars
Petals in the Wind: When red and blue taint triggers Blending, enemies within 8m are dealt 1200%/500% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself purple for 15s, increasing the effect of red, yellow, and blue taint by 40%. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Fallen Leaves: When yellow and blue taint triggers Blending along with an AoE ATK dealing 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself green for 15s, increasing Total DMG 20% for each taint in Faded Stars. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
A Flame Extinguished: When red and yellow taint triggers Blending you become tainted orange for 15s, triggering Time Fracture for 2.5s and reducing enemy Physical Defense 40% and Elemental Resist 15% for 10s; CD: 7s. Triggering it again resets the duration. Optional

Note

Red is highest priority to +3 once you get Gray. Yellow also good to consider +3.

Midnight Absinthe#

Quick search: MA, Raven, Natasha Cioara

-- Who needs IMG Weather?

#

Note

Updated 6.4. Honestly, considering only base A ranks and non-Flame Chasers, Raven is probably one of the strongest valkyries to clear ER. At least, in weathers that are not so unfavorable for her. She's rather excellent, albeit a bit awkward and her gameplay pretty much just revolves around controlling the appropiate timings.

Boss to be Chosen: Andrius, then Vill-V

Setup

#

Rank Difficulty Done Recommended Gear Clear Time Run
SSS Finality DoEgo & Aslaug 12:08m (6.1) https://youtu.be/rkCnkA44e4s

Danger

There's no other set that will work better than Aslaug does for her, especially since Aslaug enormously increases her Mist's already skyhigh damage. DoEgo is her BiS weapon purely because of the ATK statstick.

Buff Load
Taking more than 300 Elemental dmg from the currrent valkyrie makes enemies take 20% more total dmg for 10 seconds. 15
Enemies hit by weapon active take 5% bonus total dmg for 5s 5
For every 60 hits, enemies take 3% more total dmg, capped at 15%. 10

Note

Updated for 6.4.

Time Remembrance Sigil FC Support Skill
Early Pseudo Miracle Falling in Past Light
Mid Burden / Veil of Tears / Rainbow of Absence Falling in Past Light
Late Tin Flask or Key to the Deep Falling in Past Light

Note

Falling in Past Light can be kept for the remainder of the run, as it is really helpful for Raven at any floor and especially against bosses.

Time Support 1 Support 2
Early AE BR
Mid AE BR or BK
Late AE BR

Note

AE will be your main means of gather aside of her other bonuses. BR will also help to get past DPS check in the early floors. You can take BK for Heimdall if you want to be extra sure. However, if you have hands and the skill for it, you can go without BK and be fine for the fight. Raven can break Heimdall's shields easily through her Ultimate sequence. Breaking Heimdall's shields will keep him from going Red Mode until he's down to half HP.

Elysia - Signet of ■■

#

Signet Priority
Blessing of Ominous Mist: Raven Cloud has a large range and deals 6500% DMG when it explodes. Raven Cloud vaporizes after the explosion Start
Blessing of Arrowhead: Weapon actives restore 24 bonus SP and reduce Ultimate CD by 10s. Can only be triggered once per 8s 1st
Blessing of Wild Hunt: The follow-up of Basic ATK Sequence 5 is no longer limited by Night Roamer stacks. Basic ATK Sequence 5 and every hit of the follow-up consume 10 Night Roamer stacks to shoot 5 more arrows, each dealing 150% ATK of Fire DMG No
Blessing of Suppression: Feather Arrows, Feather Blades, Feathers, and Night Roamer stacks cap at 30. Night Roamer boosts Fire DMG by 15% No
Blessing of Raven Plume: Ultimate Evasion Skill reduces the ATK of enemies nearby by 60% and makes Valkyrie's attacks deal 25% ATK of bonus Fire DMG for 12s. Ultimate Evasion Skill has one extra charge No

Note

Ominous Mist and Arrowhead is all Raven needs. She does not need any more than these 2. Double Ego start is the best start you can do.

Vill-V - Signet of Helix (1st Core)

#

Note

Ideal course of build up: 2 Ego start (Ominous Mist + Arrowhead) into V-V Spider Web or Pendulum F3, finish V-V 2nd Core by F4 Doubles, grab V-V's Drama or Puppetry at F5, go shop F6 and buy Griseo's Red and Yellow Paint or Red and Kevin's TDM/Elem DMG/Elem Breach, then grab V-V's remaining Enhanced except Saga from F7 and Sneer

Signet Priority
Act V: Spider Web: Using a weapon active boosts Valkyrie ranged Total DMG by 40% for 4.5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Act II: Pendulum: Using a weapon active makes enemies take 20% bonus Total DMG for 4.5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Act III: Conflict: Using a weapon active boosts Valkyrie Total DMG by 20% for 4.5s Triggering it again resets the duration. 3rd
Act VI: Sneer: Using a weapon active restores 12 SP in 5s and reduces its CD by 15%. 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Intermezzo: Holistic Helix
Puppetry: Interlacing Cells: Extends Global Time Fracture caused by Specail Weapon: No. 4's detonation by 3s. During Global Time Fracture, gain 30% Physical and Elemental Breach. 1st
Drama: Origin of Slumber: During Gravitational Field, enemies take 20% more Total DMG. During Global Time Fracture caused by detonation, enemies take 30% more Total DMG in addition. 2nd

Note

Sneer is really good to have as it will significantly reduce the downtime that Raven has to deal with waiting for Ult and reducing its CD due to Arrowhead. It also synergizes in that you can use Active beforehand for the bonuses of Puppetry and Drama.

Kevin - Signet of Deliverance (2nd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Artifact of the Inhibitor: Ultimate boosts Elemental Breach by 25% for 5s 1st
Goblet of the Giver: Ultimate boosts Total DMG by 35% for 5s 2nd
Brand of the Undead: Ultimate boosts Elemental DMG by 30% for 5s 3rd
Rochet of the Pilgrim: Ultimate restores 3 SP per second for 5s. Optional 4th
Nexus Signet 1: Blade of the Deliverer
Crusade of the Deliverer:After 3s into Final Battle, all buffs provided by Normal Signets of Deliverance increase by 90% instead of 50% 1st
Flock of the Deliverer: Final Battle is also considered burst mode. Total DMG increases by 20% in burst mode. Optional 2nd

Note

You have to make sure to always active right away after ulting. If you get interrupted, you will miss Crusade's window for the enormous buffs from Kevin.

Aponia - Signet of Discipline (3rd Core)

#

Note

Ideal Order from F1-F7: Double Reroll into Apo2 Core by F4, then 1 Griseo door before F7, then finish Griseo by F7 double.

Signet Priority
Fourth, No Insolence: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Ultimate's Physical and Elemental DMG increases by 0.3% of of Exhortation. Using weapon skills reduces 50% Exhortation. 1st
Fifth, No Falsehood: Valkyrie starts with 70 bonus Exhortation. Whenever Exhortation is reduced, enemies take 25% bonus Total DMG for 5s. Can be refreshed. 2nd
First, No Betrayal: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Basic ATK's Total DMG increases by 0.3% of Exhortation. Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill reduces 50% Exhortation. 3rd
Nexus Signet 2: You Shall Receive Disciplines' Blessing
You Shall Follow Good: You Shall Know Your Sins' Total DMG dealt increases 40% and increases Physical and Elemental Breach by 0.25% of Exhortation for 6s upon hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
You Shall Answer Prayers: Triggering You Shall Know Your Sins causes the Valkyrie to enter Penance for 8s. In Penance, the Valkyrie takes 30% less Total DMG and deals 40% more Physical and Elemental DMG to enemies. Valkyrie deals 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG to attacking enemies when hit; CD: 5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
You Shall Punish Evil: Enemies struck by You Shall Know Your Sins two or more times take 40% more Total DMG. 5 SP is restored when these enemies are hit by You Shall Know Your Sins. 3rd

Note

Do prioritize getting Griseo's Red and Yellow Paint before pursuing Aponia's signets.

Griseo - Signet of Stars (4th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Red & Hot: Using a weapon active taints enemies nearby with red paint for 8s and makes them take 25% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG (cannot stack). Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Yellow & Warm: Using an Ultimate taints enemies nearby with yellow paint for 8s and makes them take 30% bonus Total DMG. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Black & Dark: Every time an enemy is tainted, Valkyries deals 10% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG for 20s. 6 stacks max. 3rd
Blue & Cold: Triggering an Ultimate Evasion Skill taints enemies nearby with blue paint for 8s and reduces their Total DMG and Move Speed by 30%. Triggering it again resets the duration. Optional 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Faded Stars
Petals in the Wind: When red and blue taint triggers Blending, enemies within 8m are dealt 1200%/500% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself purple for 15s, increasing the effect of red, yellow, and blue taint by 40%. Triggering it again resets the duration. Optional
Fallen Leaves: When yellow and blue taint triggers Blending along with an AoE ATK dealing 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself green for 15s, increasing Total DMG 20% for each taint in Faded Stars. Triggering it again resets the duration. Optional

Note

Prioritize only Red, Yellow and Black. If you unlock 2nd Core, that's fine, it will open up the opportunity to grab Petals in the Wind, in which case make sure to.

Miss Pink Elf#

Quick Search: MPE, Elysia, Maid

-- Miss Elysia Build 7D

#

Note

Updated for 6.4. Be advised that MPE becomes weaker the less ranks and gears she has. Basically, her downscalability issues are pretty big depending on the difficulty.

Boss to be Chosen: Husk Mysticism, then Vill-V or Mobius

Note

Choose whichever you want to booli the most. Vill-V is the easiest.

Setup

#

Rank Difficulty Done Recommended Gear Clear Time Run
SSS Finality Whisper Pri & 3-set Elysia 6:53m (6.2 2nd Half) https://youtu.be/E6y5NVtWnHo
SSS Finality Call of Crescent & Michelangelo TB Polo M 12:05m (6.1 1st Half) https://youtu.be/H4C8tPJzbxk

Note

MPE's downscalability is terrible the lower her ranks and gears are, so please do adjust the difficulty accordingly and expect different results.

Buff Load
Enemies hit by weapon active take 5% bonus total dmg for 5s 5
For every 60 hits, enemies take 3% more total dmg, capped at 15%. 10
Physical and Elemental dmg increases by 15% for 4s after triggering Ultimate evasion 10
Time slowed enemies take 8% bonus total dmg for 4s 5

Note

Updated for 6.4.

Time Remembrance Sigil FC Support Skill
Early Light as a Bodhi Leaf Empty Like Shala or The Lonely Moon
Mid Mad King's Mask / Pseudo Miracle / Rainbow of Absence Falling in Past Light
Late Tin Flask or Key to the Deep Falling in Past Light

Note

Empty Like Shala is only for the +3 on Su signets. You can instead just go with The Lonely Moon to guarantee you'll get F4 Double.

Time Support 1 Support 2
Early VC LE
Mid VC / BK BR or LE
Late SS BR or LE

Note

VC is a must for the majority of the run due to the gather that she provides. For Heimdall, you can swap VC out for BK if you don't feel confident. Afterwards, for Husk, you use BR. LE is never swapped out until you get Eden's Initial SP signet.

Elysia - Signet of ■■

#

Signet Priority
Blessing of Zenith: While Ultimate is active, each ricochet deals 15% ATK of bonus Physical DMG on hit. Every wave of ricochet reduces weapon active's CD by 0.6s. Start
Blessing of Purity: While Ultimate is active, a wave of ricochet occurs under Flawless Dome every second. The ricochets triggered in this way only ricochet 3 times but deal 130% ATK of Physical DMG. (DMG Source: Ultimate) Start
Blessing of Beauty: Using weapon active restores 1 additional Ultimate Evasion charge. Enemies take 25% bonus Total DMG when a Crystalline Seed is attached to them. 1st
Blessing of Love: While Ultimate is active, Charged Shot: Cupid's Bolt consumes 100% bonus Infatuation and deals 700% ATK of bonus Physical DMG. No
Blessing of Benevolence: Infatuation is fully restored when Ultimate Evasion Skill is triggered. If Infatuation drops below 100 after using Charged Shot: Cupid's Bolt, you can consume 1 Ultimate Evasion charge to trigger Ultimate Evasion Skill. No

Note

This build requires only 2, Zenith and Purity. Beauty is not necessary, however it's free 35% TDM Taken to take, which is really strong for early and for the rest of the run so it's good to take at any point during the run. Griseo Red Paint start at F2 is strongly recommended as it's stronger than Beauty.

Aponia - Signet of Discipline (1st Core)

#

Note

Ideal Order from F1-F7: Start with Griseo Red Paint F2, grab Aponia Basic ATK F3, finish Aponia 2nd Core by F4 Double, get Aponia Breach F5, go shop F6 and use 3* Remembrance Sigil Abuse to grab 2 Vill-V Signets, then finish V-V 2nd Core by F7 Double.

Signet Priority
First, No Betrayal: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Basic ATK's Total DMG increases by 0.3% of Exhortation. Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill reduces 50% Exhortation. 1st
Third, No Brutality: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Valkyrie has bonus SP regen per second equal to 1% of Exhortation. Reaching 160 combo reduces 50% Exhortation. 2nd
Fifth, No Falsehood: Valkyrie starts with 70 bonus Exhortation. Whenever Exhortation is reduced, enemies take 25% bonus Total DMG for 5s. Can be refreshed. 3rd
Nexus Signet 2: You Shall Receive Disciplines' Blessing
You Shall Follow Good: You Shall Know Your Sins' Total DMG dealt increases 40% and increases Physical and Elemental Breach by 0.25% of Exhortation for 6s upon hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
You Shall Answer Prayers: Triggering You Shall Know Your Sins causes the Valkyrie to enter Penance for 8s. In Penance, the Valkyrie takes 30% less Total DMG and deals 40% more Physical and Elemental DMG to enemies. Valkyrie deals 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG to attacking enemies when hit; CD: 5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
You Shall Punish Evil: Enemies struck by You Shall Know Your Sins two or more times take 40% more Total DMG. 5 SP is restored when these enemies are hit by You Shall Know Your Sins. 3rd

Note

Avoid the Ultimate signet at all costs. You'll be fucking your run over entirely if you take it. Basic ATK is high priority to +3.

Vill-V - Signet of Helix (2nd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Act V: Spider Web: Using a weapon active boosts Valkyrie ranged Total DMG by 40% for 4.5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Act II: Pendulum: Using a weapon active makes enemies take 20% bonus Total DMG for 4.5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Act III: Conflict: Using a weapon active boosts Valkyrie Total DMG by 20% for 4.5s Triggering it again resets the duration. 3rd
Act IV: Spoon: Using a weapon active boosts Physical DMG and Elemental DMG from Charge ATK and Combo ATK by 25% for 4.5s Triggering it again resets the duration. 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Intermezzo: Holistic Helix
Puppetry: Interlacing Cells: Extends Global Time Fracture caused by Specail Weapon: No. 4's detonation by 3s. During Global Time Fracture, gain 30% Physical and Elemental Breach. 1st
Drama: Origin of Slumber: During Gravitational Field, enemies take 20% more Total DMG. During Global Time Fracture caused by detonation, enemies take 30% more Total DMG in addition. 2nd
Saga: Overlapping Needles: Gravitational Field affects a larger area and gain a stronger pull. DMG-dealing hits deal and extra 500% ATK of Adaptive DMG. Optional 3rd

Note

Drama is high priority to +3. You only consider taking Saga if you actually want its strong and reliable gather, which in turn allows you to swap VC out for BR, allowing you for way higher DPS and burst damage windows.

Su - Signet of Bodhi (3rd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Motto of Pubbe-Nivasanussati: Combo hits are reset at 150 to boost Total DMG by 55% for 10s. 1st
Motto of Asavakkhaya: Attacks grant 25 bonus combo hits on hit. CD: 5s. 2nd
Motto of Dibba-Cakkhu: Combo hits are reset at 150 to boost Total DMG taken by all enemies by 35% for 10s. 3rd
Motto of Iddhi-Vidha: Combo hits are increased to 60 when below 60. CD: 10s. 4th
Motto of Ceto-Pariya-Nana: Combo hits are reset at 150 to restore 30 SP. 5th
Nexus Signet 2: Dictum of Bodhi
Dictum of Santam: Bodhi: Eyes Open inflicts 3 random debuffs lasting 3s on hit. Optional 1st
Dictum of Anatman: The Bodhi: Eyes Open lasts for 3s longer. For every debuff on the target enemy, it takes 5% bonus Total DMG. Optional 2nd

Note

Su provides a good powerspike, noticeably against single-target damage (bosses mainly). The 2 Enhanceds is up to you; you can take them if you want, but be advised that they don't really have a noticeable impact as much as getting the other signets' Enhanceds.

Kalpas - Signet of Decimation (4th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Blade, Grave and Scar: Every 100 HP loss boosts Total DMG by 1.0%. 1st
Bone, Blood and Ribbon: Every 100 HP loss boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 0.8%. 2nd
Path, Misfortune and Written Fate: Max HP increases by 25%. 3rd
Desireless, Mindless, and Homeless: Losing HP boosts Total DMG taken by all enemies by 25% for 8s. Optional 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Soldiers, Scissors, Spoils, and Slaughter

Note

If needed, you can choose to intentionally die and make use of Elysia's passive revival to immediately recharge Bloodboil Armor to the max so you can further get stronger and make sure to finish the run.

Griseo - Signet of Stars (5th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Red & Hot: Using a weapon active taints enemies nearby with red paint for 8s and makes them take 25% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG (cannot stack). Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Black & Dark: Every time an enemy is tainted, Valkyries deals 10% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG for 20s. 6 stacks max. 2nd

Note

Red and Black are high priority to +3.

Eden - Signet of Gold (6th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Recitatif of Eden: Every 10 SP left boosts Total DMG by 3.0% 1st
Recitatif of Creeks: Every 10 SP left boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 2.5% 2nd
Recitatif of Fine Jade: Initial SP and max SP increase by 30 3rd
Nexus Signet 1: Aria of Gold

Palatinus Equinox#

Quick Search: PE, Juan, Horse, Goose, Dudu

-- Guardian Form Build

#

Note

Updated to 6.3. This build is far stronger, superior and easier compared to Gallop build. Guardian Form has a natural close-quarters gather. Anyone that's on her screen at the moment of using her Charged ATK will be gathered in front of her Severance. It also has a big AoE that hits every one of these mobs. And since the 1800% DMG explosion from it has a delay, it means that if the wave was killed by the downward attack, then the next wave will be damaged by Severance and be impaired already, giving it a edge on potential DPS.

Boss to be chosen: Husk Mysticism, then Aponia or Vill-V.

Setup

#

Rank Difficulty Done Recommended Gear Clear Time Run
SSS Finality Midnight Ataegina & BiankaT 6:14m (6.3) https://youtu.be/yeNnofFq614

Note

In downscalability terms, while PE can use stigs like Elysia TB and Dirac M, you can expect her performance to probably not be as comparable as full BiankaT, but nonetheless she should work well. Other weapons, though... that's one sad PE.

Buff Load
Enemies hit by weapon active take 5% bonus total dmg for 5s 5
For every 60 hits, enemies take 3% more total dmg, capped at 15%. 10
Physical and Elemental dmg increases by 15% for 4s after triggering Ultimate evasion 10
Time slowed enemies take 8% bonus total dmg for 4s 5

Note

Updated for 6.4.

Time Remembrance Sigil FC Support Skill
Early Memory Hometown
Mid Veil of Tears / Pseudo Miracle / Rainbow of Absence The Lonely Moon OR Falling in Past Light
Late Proof of Good and Evil or Key to the Deep Falling in Past Light

Note

Hometown is essential to get Hua's 3 signets at +3 right away. By F6 Shop, you can swap it to The Lonely Moon, then later you can swap TLM for Falling in Past Light before Heimdall fight.

Time Support 1 Support 2
Early SN SS
Mid BK SS
Late BR SS

Note

SN and SS are your staple supports during almost all the run. SN not only provides an useful gather on a 30s CD but also 15% TDM. BR is not recommended due to making use of the 1 Sp/s Load. SA can be used instead, but in exchange for 50s CD. For Heimdall, make sure to bring BK. Then, for Husk Mysticism fight, you can swap SN out for BR.

Elysia - Signet of ■■

#

Signet Priority
Blessing of Exodus: Valkyrie's total DMG is increased by 25%, and the last hit of Equinox Severance will shatter the ground and consume Knight Guardian, dealing 1200% of ATK as physical DMG to all enemies and impairing them for 12s, reducing the enemies' DEF by 30%. Start
Blessing of Abyssal Chant: The physical DMG of Valkyrie is increased by 40%, the total DMG dealt by the Ultimate is increased by 180%, and the Ultimate Evasion Skill is refreshed twice after the Ultimate is cast. Start
Blessing of Commitment: Valkyrie's physical DMG is increased by 50%, and the total DMG of weapon skills increases by 60%. The first two hits of Equinox Severance restore 1 SP per hit and reduce Ultimate CD by 1s. CD: 20s. 1st
Blessing of Equinox: Valkyrie's total DMG is increased by 30%. Palatinus Equinox is enhanced when switching forms and unleashing the Ultimate. Valkyrie deals 30% more physical DMG for 15s, repeatedly triggering refreshes the duration. 2nd
Blessing of Gallop: The physical DMG of Valkyrie is increased by 15%, and the physical DMG of Elite Thrust is increased by 0.4% for every 1% of HP lost. The physical DMG of Sprint is increased by 0.2%. Each hit reduces HP by 5% and grants 0.6 SP. Consumes Knight Guardian to restore all ICHOR. No

Note

Exodus + Abyssal Chant are a given must-start. It is strongly recommended to bald for F2 Ego start in order to get your 3rd Ego signet, Commitment, which will massively give a powerspike to this build's potential and strength. You can also pick up Equinox later during the run, which will mainly be present when you use Ultimate.

Hua - Signet of Vicissitude (1st Core)

#

Note

Ideal Order from F1-F7: 3 Ego Start (Exodus + Abyssal Chant + Commitment) into Hua's TDM or Phys Breach F3, finish Hua 2nd Core by F4 Double, grab Broken Dream F5 and go shop F6, use 3* Remembrance Sigil Abuse to buy Griseo's Red Paint and Aponia's First OR Vill-V's Pendulum/Conflict. Then finish either Aponia 2nd Core or Vill-V 2nd Core, but give more priority to Aponia.

Signet Priority
No One To Share: Physical Breach increases by 0.6% per second. 40 stacks max. Taking DMG reduces 10 stacks. 1st
Long Trip: Total DMG increases by 1.0% per second. 40 stacks max. Taking DMG reduces 10 stacks. 2nd
Days Gone: Physical DMG increases by 0.8% per second. 40 stacks max. Taking DMG reduces 10 stacks. 3rd
Nexus Signet 2: Suffering Mass
Broken Dream: When possessing Soldier's Remembrance., increase the maximum stack of normal Vicissitude signets by 20 1st

Note

2nd Core provides a massive powerspike, and Broken Dream further intensifies that powerspike.

Aponia - Signet of Discipline (2nd Core)

#

Signet Priority
First, No Betrayal: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Basic ATK's Total DMG increases by 0.3% of Exhortation. Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill reduces 50% Exhortation. 1st
Third, No Brutality: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Valkyrie has bonus SP regen per second equal to 1% of Exhortation. Reaching 160 combo reduces 50% Exhortation. 2nd
Fifth, No Falsehood: Valkyrie starts with 70 bonus Exhortation. Whenever Exhortation is reduced, enemies take 25% bonus Total DMG for 5s. Can be refreshed. 3rd
Nexus Signet 2: You Shall Receive Disciplines' Blessing
You Shall Follow Good: You Shall Know Your Sins' Total DMG dealt increases 40% and increases Physical and Elemental Breach by 0.25% of Exhortation for 6s upon hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
You Shall Answer Prayers: Triggering You Shall Know Your Sins causes the Valkyrie to enter Penance for 8s. In Penance, the Valkyrie takes 30% less Total DMG and deals 40% more Physical and Elemental DMG to enemies. Valkyrie deals 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG to attacking enemies when hit; CD: 5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
You Shall Punish Evil: Enemies struck by You Shall Know Your Sins two or more times take 40% more Total DMG. 5 SP is restored when these enemies are hit by You Shall Know Your Sins. 3rd

Note

Basic ATK is high priority to +3. You want to make sure you always let Aponia2 hit FIRST on every Floor start before you go into the whole sequence of Evading to Enemy into Guardian's Charged ATK.

Vill-V - Signet of Helix (3rd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Act II: Pendulum: Using a weapon active makes enemies take 20% bonus Total DMG for 4.5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Act III: Conflict: Using a weapon active boosts Valkyrie Total DMG by 20% for 4.5s Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
ACT I: Magic: Using a weapon active boosts its Total DMG by 10%. 6 stacks max. Reset at the end of each battle. 3rd
Act IV: Spoon: Using a weapon active boosts Physical DMG and Elemental DMG from Charge ATK and Combo ATK by 25% for 4.5s Triggering it again resets the duration. 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Intermezzo: Holistic Helix
Drama: Origin of Slumber: During Gravitational Field, enemies take 20% more Total DMG. During Global Time Fracture caused by detonation, enemies take 30% more Total DMG in addition. 1st
Saga: Overlapping Needles: Gravitational Field affects a larger area and gain a stronger pull. DMG-dealing hits deal and extra 500% ATK of Adaptive DMG. Filler

Note

I didn't actually intend to get Puppetry in this run. Completely ignore it, as we already get the needed Breach from Hua2 and Aponia2's Breach. Then, Drama is really high priority to +3. Either Pendulum or Conflict also good to +3, but give higher priority to Griseo2's signets.

Griseo - Signet of Stars (4th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Red & Hot: Using a weapon active taints enemies nearby with red paint for 8s and makes them take 25% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG (cannot stack). Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Black & Dark: Every time an enemy is tainted, Valkyries deals 10% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG for 20s. 6 stacks max. 2nd
Yellow & Warm: Using an Ultimate taints enemies nearby with yellow paint for 8s and makes them take 30% bonus Total DMG. Triggering it again resets the duration. 3rd
Blue & Cold: Triggering an Ultimate Evasion Skill taints enemies nearby with blue paint for 8s and reduces their Total DMG and Move Speed by 30%. Triggering it again resets the duration. 4th
Grey & Empty: Enemies stay tainted for 5s longer. Optional 5th
Nexus Signet 2: Faded Stars
Petals in the Wind: When red and blue taint triggers Blending, enemies within 8m are dealt 1200%/500% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself purple for 15s, increasing the effect of red, yellow, and blue taint by 40%. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Fallen Leaves: When yellow and blue taint triggers Blending along with an AoE ATK dealing 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself green for 15s, increasing Total DMG 20% for each taint in Faded Stars. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd

Note

Red is highest priority to +3. Yellow is good to +3, even more if you get Grey afterwards. Black is nice to have at +2 from 3* Remembrance Sigil Abuse, which in turn is also strongly recommended for getting Petals and Fallen Leaves both at +2. Then, Black and Fallen Leaves are good to +3.

Sakura - Signet of Setsuna (Felis Shop Signets)

#

Signet Priority
Bountiful Blossom: Koyo: Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill boosts Total DMG taken by all enemies by 30% for 8s. 1st
Bountiful Blossom: Botan: Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill boosts Total DMG by 40% for 8s. 2nd
Bountiful Blossom: Fuji: Ultimate Evasion Skill has 1 more charge and 10% reduced CD. Optional 3rd

-- Knight Form Build

#

Note

Updated to 6.3. Okay, so, for gameplay purposes. There are a few things to be noted that need to be clear. Unlike Guardian Form, this build has a rather annoying and glaring weakness. It's very dependant on gather. Since this build is focused on single-target damage due to the nature of how PE's Charged ATK works, you need gather. And then, make sure your Charged ATK is hitting ALL gathered enemies. While it's possible for PE to reposition herself during the Charge so that she can control the direction where the Charge will go, this is very important to micromanage in order to actually make sure you're not wasting your DPS potential. This is important especially for Double Bonus floors if you want to make sure you'll get them.

Boss to be chosen: Husk Mysticism, then Aponia or Vill-V.

Setup

#

Rank Difficulty Done Recommended Gear Clear Time Run
SSS Finality Midnight Ataegina & BiankaT 6:37m (6.3) https://youtu.be/Hce6RuBsk_Y

Note

In downscalability terms, while PE can use stigs like Elysia TB and Dirac M, you can expect her performance to probably not be as comparable as full BiankaT, but nonetheless she should work well. Other weapons, though... that's one sad PE.

Buff Load
Enemies hit by weapon active take 5% bonus total dmg for 5s 5
For every 60 hits, enemies take 3% more total dmg, capped at 15%. 10
Physical and Elemental dmg increases by 15% for 4s after triggering Ultimate evasion 10
Time slowed enemies take 8% bonus total dmg for 4s 5

Note

Updated for 6.4. Whichever of the 10 doesn't matter; both can have the same consistency, but you can go with the Time-Slowed one if you don't have confidence in avoiding being hit.

Time Remembrance Sigil FC Support Skill
Early Memory Hometown
Mid Forget-Me-Not / Veil of Tears / Rainbow of Absence The Lonely Moon OR Falling in Past Light
Late Key to the Deep Falling in Past Light

Note

Hometown is essential to get Hua's 3 signets at +3 right away. By F6 Shop, you can swap it to The Lonely Moon, then later you can swap TLM for Falling in Past Light before Heimdall fight.

Time Support 1 Support 2
Early SN SS
Mid BK SS
Late BR SS

Note

SN and SS are your staple supports during almost all the run. SN not only provides an useful gather on a 30s CD but also 15% TDM. BR is not recommended due to making use of the 1 Sp/s Load. SA can be used instead, but in exchange for 50s CD. For Heimdall, make sure to bring BK. Then, for Husk Mysticism fight, you can swap SN out for BR.

Elysia - Signet of ■■

#

Signet Priority
Blessing of Gallop: The physical DMG of Valkyrie is increased by 15%, and the physical DMG of Elite Thrust is increased by 0.4% for every 1% of HP lost. The physical DMG of Sprint is increased by 0.2%. Each hit reduces HP by 5% and grants 0.6 SP. Consumes Knight Guardian to restore all ICHOR. Start
Blessing of Abyssal Chant: The physical DMG of Valkyrie is increased by 40%, the total DMG dealt by the Ultimate is increased by 180%, and the Ultimate Evasion Skill is refreshed twice after the Ultimate is cast. Start
Blessing of Equinox: Valkyrie's total DMG is increased by 30%. Palatinus Equinox is enhanced when switching forms and unleashing the Ultimate. Valkyrie deals 30% more physical DMG for 15s, repeatedly triggering refreshes the duration. 1st
Blessing of Exodus: Valkyrie's total DMG is increased by 25%, and the last hit of Equinox Severance will shatter the ground and consume Knight Guardian, dealing 1200% of ATK as physical DMG to all enemies and impairing them for 12s, reducing the enemies' DEF by 30%. No
Blessing of Commitment: Valkyrie's physical DMG is increased by 50%, and the total DMG of weapon skills increases by 60%. The first two hits of Equinox Severance restore 1 SP per hit and reduce Ultimate CD by 1s. CD: 20s. No

Note

Gallop + Abyssal Chant are a given must-start. It is strongly recommended to bald for F2 Ego start in order to get your 3rd Ego signet, Equinox, which will massively give a powerspike to this build's potential and strength.

Hua - Signet of Vicissitude (1st Core)

#

Note

Ideal Order from F1-F7: 3 Ego Start (Gallop + Abyssal Chant + Equinox) into Hua's Phys Breach F3, finish Hua 2nd Core by F4 Double, grab Broken Dream F5 and go shop F6, use 3* Remembrance Sigil Abuse to buy EITHER Griseo's Red Paint or both of Kalpas' DMG boost signets. If not lucky, one of them and Aponia's Basic ATK, then finish either Kalpas 2nd Core or Aponia 2nd Core by F7 Double based on what you got and can finish.

Signet Priority
No One To Share: Physical Breach increases by 0.6% per second. 40 stacks max. Taking DMG reduces 10 stacks. 1st
Long Trip: Total DMG increases by 1.0% per second. 40 stacks max. Taking DMG reduces 10 stacks. 2nd
Days Gone: Physical DMG increases by 0.8% per second. 40 stacks max. Taking DMG reduces 10 stacks. 3rd
Nexus Signet 2: Suffering Mass
Broken Dream: When possessing Soldier's Remembrance., increase the maximum stack of normal Vicissitude signets by 20 1st

Note

2nd Core provides a massive powerspike, and Broken Dream further intensifies that powerspike.

Aponia - Signet of Discipline (2nd Core)

#

Signet Priority
First, No Betrayal: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Basic ATK's Total DMG increases by 0.3% of Exhortation. Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill reduces 50% Exhortation. 1st
Third, No Brutality: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Valkyrie has bonus SP regen per second equal to 1% of Exhortation. Reaching 160 combo reduces 50% Exhortation. 2nd
Fifth, No Falsehood: Valkyrie starts with 70 bonus Exhortation. Whenever Exhortation is reduced, enemies take 25% bonus Total DMG for 5s. Can be refreshed. 3rd
Fourth, No Insolence: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Ultimate's Physical and Elemental DMG increases by 0.3% of of Exhortation. Using weapon skills reduces 50% Exhortation. 4th
Nexus Signet 2: You Shall Receive Disciplines' Blessing
You Shall Follow Good: You Shall Know Your Sins' Total DMG dealt increases 40% and increases Physical and Elemental Breach by 0.25% of Exhortation for 6s upon hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
You Shall Answer Prayers: Triggering You Shall Know Your Sins causes the Valkyrie to enter Penance for 8s. In Penance, the Valkyrie takes 30% less Total DMG and deals 40% more Physical and Elemental DMG to enemies. Valkyrie deals 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG to attacking enemies when hit; CD: 5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
You Shall Punish Evil: Enemies struck by You Shall Know Your Sins two or more times take 40% more Total DMG. 5 SP is restored when these enemies are hit by You Shall Know Your Sins. 3rd

Note

Basic ATK is high priority to +3. Ultimate is also very good to +3. When you have Basic, use Active until Aponia2 hits, then go into Knight Form. When you also get Ultimate afterwards, you can just Active (only if you already have Griseo's Red Paint) then go into Knight Form straight away.

Kalpas - Signet of Decimation (3rd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Blade, Grave and Scar: Every 100 HP loss boosts Total DMG by 1.0%. 1st
Bone, Blood and Ribbon: Every 100 HP loss boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 0.8%. 2nd
Path, Misfortune and Written Fate: Max HP increases by 25%. 3rd
Desireless, Mindless and Homeless: Losing HP boosts Total DMG taken by all enemies by 25% for 8s. 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Soldiers, Scissors, Spoils, and Slaughter

Note

All 4 of Kalpas' signets are STRONGLY RECOMMENDED to get with 3* Remembrance Sigil Abuse. Getting them this way will be a really massive powerspike for PE.

Griseo - Signet of Stars (4th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Red & Hot: Using a weapon active taints enemies nearby with red paint for 8s and makes them take 25% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG (cannot stack). Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Black & Dark: Every time an enemy is tainted, Valkyries deals 10% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG for 20s. 6 stacks max. 2nd
Yellow & Warm: Using an Ultimate taints enemies nearby with yellow paint for 8s and makes them take 30% bonus Total DMG. Triggering it again resets the duration. 3rd
Blue & Cold: Triggering an Ultimate Evasion Skill taints enemies nearby with blue paint for 8s and reduces their Total DMG and Move Speed by 30%. Triggering it again resets the duration. 4th
Grey & Empty: Enemies stay tainted for 5s longer. Optional 5th
Nexus Signet 2: Faded Stars
Petals in the Wind: When red and blue taint triggers Blending, enemies within 8m are dealt 1200%/500% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself purple for 15s, increasing the effect of red, yellow, and blue taint by 40%. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Fallen Leaves: When yellow and blue taint triggers Blending along with an AoE ATK dealing 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself green for 15s, increasing Total DMG 20% for each taint in Faded Stars. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd

Note

Red is highest priority to +3. Yellow is good to +3, even more if you get Grey afterwards. Black is nice to have at +2 from 3* Remembrance Sigil Abuse, which in turn is also strongly recommended for getting Petals and Fallen Leaves both at +2.

Sakura - Signet of Setsuna (Felis Shop Signets)

Bountiful Blossom: Koyo: Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill boosts Total DMG taken by all enemies by 30% for 8s. 1st
Bountiful Blossom: Botan: Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill boosts Total DMG by 40% for 8s. 2nd
Bountiful Blossom: Fuji: Ultimate Evasion Skill has 1 more charge and 10% reduced CD. Optional 3rd

Prinzessin der Verurteilung#

Quick Search: PV, Fischl, Genshin, Oz

-- General Build 7D

#

Note

Updated 6.4. This is her best build up to date.

Boss to be Chosen: Husk Mysticism, then Aponia

Setup

#

Rank Difficulty Done Recommended Gear Clear Time Run
SSS Finality DoEgo & Zhenyi 8:51m (6.0 2nd Half) https://youtu.be/t75HyvhKV6I

Danger

In terms of downscalability, this valkyrie can result a bit weak, so she prefers lower difficulties when otherwise not having a pri for her to use in place of Mitternachts.

Buff Load
Taking more than 300 Elemental dmg from the currrent valkyrie makes enemies take 20% more total dmg for 10 seconds. 15
Enemies hit by weapon active take 5% bonus total dmg for 5s 5
For every 60 hits, enemies take 3% more total dmg, capped at 15%. 10

Note

Updated for 6.4.

Time Remembrance Sigil FC Support Skill
Early Veil of Tears OR Pseudo Miracle The Lonely Moon OR Falling in Past Light
Mid Mad King's Mask / Forbidden Seed / Rainbow of Absence Because of You OR Falling in Past Light
Late Tin Flask or Key to the Deep Falling in Past Light

Note

Because Of You is best taken by F5 shop: as early as possible, and it's only if you want to secure getting Midnight (see Ego signet section for more info). The Lonely Moon or Falling in Past Light as start depends on your preference; FPL preferred if you want to take the V-V start route, TLM for Aponia start route.

Time Support 1 Support 2
Early AE BR
Mid AE BR or BK
Late AE BR

Note

You'll want to prioritize saving AE for gather sometimes if you are lacking in a ELF that has gather or while you don't have Vill-V's 2nd Core unlocked, as Fischl is straight up horrible without it. She's literally dependant on it due to her almost non-existent AoE damage, especially when lacking 3rd signet which is pretty much a requirement.

Note

BKE is only for the purposes of filling Heimdall's Heavy Trauma Bar, forcefully ending his Red Mode.

Elysia - Signet of ■■

#

Signet Priority
Blessing of Retribution: Grants 1 stack of Blessing of Retribution every 7s. 2 stacks max. QTE consumes 1 stack to create a small lightning field which lasts 2s and deals 3x225% ATK of Lightning DMG per 0.4s to enemies within. Starts with 2 stacks Start
Blessing of Fate: When hitting an enemy weakspot with a weapon active, Oz unleashes dark lightning to deal 2000% ATK of Lightning DMG 1st
Blessing of Midnight: During Ultimate, Oz lingers on for 7s after the arrow rain. Every 7 hits from Oz on enemies within the Ultimate range summons dark lightning to deal 1500% ATK of Lightning DMG 2nd
Blessing of Nightfall: Weapon actives deal 200% bonus Total DMG. Summoning Oz with Charged ATK or casting Ultimate refills 2 weapon active charges No
Blessing of Dark Wings: When Ultimate Evasion Skill is triggered, Oz unleashes dark lightning to deal 4200% ATK of Lightning DMG No

Note

Fischl requires 3 Ego signets: Retribution into Fate start, then Midnight. 3rd Ego signet is a MUST because Fischl's personal and AoE damage is genuinely horrible without Midnight. It forms such a big part of her build here in ER that Fischl without any of these 3 signets becomes one of the weakest and most dogshit ER valks in the game. As such, Because of You is recommended to secure this.

Danger

This build has 2 different startups to note: We're gonna assume V-V start. Aponia start is slightly stronger, but V-V start is more comfortable and preferred if you don't have any ELF that provides gather or don't want to bother too much resetting for spawn RNG and maintaining enemies in the circle for Retribution. That's the only importance of choice; whether you choose one or the other, their order of priority is just swapped up between them. (Aponia 1st, V-V 2nd)

Vill-V - Signet of Helix (1st Core)

#

Note

Ideal course of build up: 2/3 Ego Start, finish V-V 2nd Core by F4 or F6, shop at F5, then either finish Aponia 2nd Core by F7 or grab V-V2's both Drama and Puppetry. For Aponia2, grab both the Breach and TDM Taken

Signet Priority
Act V: Spider Web: Using a weapon active boosts Valkyrie ranged Total DMG by 40% for 4.5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Act II: Pendulum: Using a weapon active makes enemies take 20% bonus Total DMG for 4.5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Act III: Conflict: Using a weapon active boosts Valkyrie Total DMG by 20% for 4.5s Triggering it again resets the duration. 3rd
Act IV: Spoon: Using a weapon active boosts Physical DMG and Elemental DMG from Charge ATK and Combo ATK by 25% for 4.5s Triggering it again resets the duration. 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Intermezzo: Holistic Helix
Puppetry: Interlacing Cells: Extends Global Time Fracture caused by Specail Weapon: No. 4's detonation by 3s. During Global Time Fracture, gain 30% Physical and Elemental Breach. 1st
Drama: Origin of Slumber: During Gravitational Field, enemies take 20% more Total DMG. During Global Time Fracture caused by detonation, enemies take 30% more Total DMG in addition. 2nd

Aponia - Signet of Discipline (2nd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Sixth, No Decadence: Boosts Valkyrie Total DMG by 20% and keeps Exhortation from reducing for 15s upon QTE hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Fourth, No Insolence: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Ultimate's Physical and Elemental DMG increases by 0.3% of of Exhortation. Using weapon skills reduces 50% Exhortation. 2nd
Third, No Brutality: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Valkyrie has bonus SP regen per second equal to 1% of Exhortation. Reaching 160 combo reduces 50% Exhortation. 3rd
First, No Betrayal: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Basic ATK's Total DMG increases by 0.3% of Exhortation. Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill reduces 50% Exhortation Optional 4th
Nexus Signet Core 2: You Shall Receive Disciplines' Blessing
You Shall Follow Good: You Shall Know Your Sins' Total DMG dealt increases 40% and increases Physical and Elemental Breach by 0.25% of Exhortation for 6s upon hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
You Shall Punish Evil: Enemies struck by You Shall Know Your Sins two or more times take 40% more Total DMG. 5 SP is restored when these enemies are hit by You Shall Know Your Sins. 2nd
You Shall Answer Prayers: Triggering You Shall Know Your Sins causes the Valkyrie to enter Penance for 8s. In Penance, the Valkyrie takes 30% less Total DMG and deals 40% more Physical and Elemental DMG to enemies. Valkyrie deals 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG to attacking enemies when hit; CD: 5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 3rd

Kalpas - Signet of Decimation (3rd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Blade, Grave and Scar: Every 100 HP loss boosts Total DMG by 1.0%. 1st
Bone, Blood and Ribbon: Every 100 HP loss boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 0.8%. 2nd
Path, Misfortune and Written Fate: Max HP increases by 25%. 3rd
Nexus Signet 2: Soldiers, Scissors, Spoils, and Slaughter Not Necessary

Note

Fischl has no in-built healing, and due to the usage of BR, she doesn't need Kalpas cores. Instead, only aim for Kalpas' both DMG boosts and Max HP. Preferred to take from Felis Shop basically.

Mobius - Signet of Infinity (4th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Entwined [P]: For every summoned entity, ELF, or Support Valkyrie present, enemies take 8% bonus Total DMG (5 stacks max). 1st
Rodent [V]: For every summoned entity, ELF, or Support Valkyrie present, Valkyrie deals 10% bonus Total DMG (5 stacks max). 2nd
Lip Poison [E]: Total DMG from summoned entities, ELFs, and Support Valkyries increases by 60%. 3rd
Lodging [C]: ELF Ultimates and Support Valkyries' support skills have 20% reduced CD. Optional
Nexus Signet 1: Infinite [X] Important
Dead [X]: For every second in Mind Sync, Valkyrie herself, summoned entities, ELFs, and Support Valkyries deal 10% bonus Total DMG. 5 stacks max. 9 stacks max with any summoned entity present. Reset on exiting Mind Sync. 1st, YES
Newborn [X]: Triggering Mind Sync again during Mind Sync no longer resets the duration but extends the duration by 4.0s instead. With any summoned entity present, the duration is extended by 5s additionally. 2nd, YES

Note

Mobius is REALLY high priority to finish and get both Dead [X] and Newborn [X]. The reason is because of the way Oz works. Oz stays in field way too long, and Fischl's only means of recasting Oz to naturally refresh Mind Sync's duration is through the signet of Nightfall or through Ultimate Cast. This makes Newborn [X] as VERY essential and must-take alongside Dead [X]. Basically, Dead [X] won't be useful for long without Newborn [X] present.

Griseo - Signet of Stars (5th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Red & Hot: Using a weapon active taints enemies nearby with red paint for 8s and makes them take 25% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG (cannot stack). Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Yellow & Warm: Using an Ultimate taints enemies nearby with yellow paint for 8s and makes them take 30% bonus Total DMG. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Black & Dark: Every time an enemy is tainted, Valkyries deals 10% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG for 20s. 6 stacks max. 3rd
Blue & Cold: Triggering an Ultimate Evasion Skill taints enemies nearby with blue paint for 8s and reduces their Total DMG and Move Speed by 30%. Triggering it again resets the duration. 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Faded Stars
Fallen Leaves: When yellow and blue taint triggers Blending along with an AoE ATK dealing 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself green for 15s, increasing Total DMG 20% for each taint in Faded Stars. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st

Pardofelis - Signet of Reverie (6th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Neighborhood Chatters: Every 100 Shiny Silvers obtained this round boost max HP by 25 and max SP by 1. 1st

-- (Meme) Mobius 2 Build

#

Note

Updated 6.4. Hey! It's a new Fischl video run! She's op, right? Right? Wait, what's that? Is that... Mobius 2nd Core!? B-but, I thought that core was garbage! How!? What the fuck, is it actually good!? Spoiler: It is not. It's just a meme build.

Danger

Do this build only for the fun of it, that's its purpose.

Boss to be Chosen: Husk, then Vill-V or Aponia

Setup

#

Rank Difficulty Done Recommended Gear Clear Time Run
SSS Finality DoEgo & Zhenyi 13:29m (6.1 1st Half) https://youtu.be/4DO97eW9v8A

Danger

In terms of downscalability, this valkyrie can result a bit weak, so she prefers lower difficulties when otherwise not having a pri for her to use in place of Mitternachts.

Buff Load
Taking more than 300 Elemental dmg from the currrent valkyrie makes enemies take 20% more total dmg for 10 seconds. 15
Enemies hit by weapon active take 5% bonus total dmg for 5s 5
For every 60 hits, enemies take 3% more total dmg, capped at 15%. 10

Note

Updated for 6.4.

Time Remembrance Sigil FC Support Skill
Early Forbidden Seed Falling in Past Light
Mid Pseudo Miracle / Veil of Tears / Rainbow of Absence Because of You (Optional) OR Falling in Past Light
Late Tin Flask or Key to the Deep Falling in Past Light

Note

Because Of You is best taken by F5 shop: as early as possible, and it's only if you want to secure getting Midnight (see Ego signet section for more info). The Lonely Moon or Falling in Past Light as start depends on your preference; FPL preferred if you want to take the V-V start route, TLM for Aponia start route.

Time Support 1 Support 2
Early AE BR
Mid AE BK
Late AE BR or FR

Note

You'll want to prioritize saving AE for gather sometimes if you are lacking in a ELF that has gather, as Fischl is straight up horrible without it. She's literally dependant on it due to her almost non-existent AoE damage, especially when lacking 3rd signet which is pretty much a requirement. Remember to bring BK before Heimdall fight. Afterwards, you can swap BK out for FR. FR will let you be more comfortable.

Elysia - Signet of ■■

#

Signet Priority
Blessing of Retribution: Grants 1 stack of Blessing of Retribution every 7s. 2 stacks max. QTE consumes 1 stack to create a small lightning field which lasts 2s and deals 3x225% ATK of Lightning DMG per 0.4s to enemies within. Starts with 2 stacks Start
Blessing of Fate: When hitting an enemy weakspot with a weapon active, Oz unleashes dark lightning to deal 2000% ATK of Lightning DMG 1st
Blessing of Midnight: During Ultimate, Oz lingers on for 7s after the arrow rain. Every 7 hits from Oz on enemies within the Ultimate range summons dark lightning to deal 1500% ATK of Lightning DMG 2nd
Blessing of Nightfall: Weapon actives deal 200% bonus Total DMG. Summoning Oz with Charged ATK or casting Ultimate refills 2 weapon active charges No
Blessing of Dark Wings: When Ultimate Evasion Skill is triggered, Oz unleashes dark lightning to deal 4200% ATK of Lightning DMG No

Mobius - Signet of Infinity (1st Core)

#

Note

Ideal course of build up: 2/3 Ego Start, finish Mobius 2nd Core by F4 or F6, shop at F5 and grab 2 of V-V's signets and 1 Aponia Signet, then grab Mobius door at F7 Double for TDM Taken and Progress% signets.

Signet Priority
Entwined [P]: For every summoned entity, ELF, or Support Valkyrie present, enemies take 8% bonus Total DMG (5 stacks max). 1st
Rodent [V]: For every summoned entity, ELF, or Support Valkyrie present, Valkyrie deals 10% bonus Total DMG (5 stacks max). 2nd
Lip Poison [E]: Total DMG from summoned entities, ELFs, and Support Valkyries increases by 60%. 3rd
Nexus Signet 2: Infinite [M]
Sacrificial [M]: When a self-generated summoned entity remains for more than 1s, it increases the duration of Sentience Sync by 1s every second when ifs active, and increases the transfer progress by 15% per second when ifs inactive. 1st
Collapsed [M]: Each time a summoned entity deals DMG to enemies, the total DMG taken by the enemies increases by 1%, and if Sentience Sync is activated, each ATK dealt by Valkyrie increases the total DMG taken by the enemies by 1%. This effect has a 1s CD and a 30% cap. 2nd
Immortal [M]: When a self-generated summoned entity remains for more than 8s, the physical and elemental DMG it deals increase by 5% per second, up to a maximum of 50% While Sentience Sync is active, Valkyrie will accumulate 50% of the summoned entitys physical and elemental DMG increase, with a cap of 30%. Optional 3rd

Note

Collapsed is priority to upgrade to +3 here. Everything else can just be left as is, and focus on upgrading V-V's signets instead.

Vill-V - Signet of Helix (2nd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Act V: Spider Web: Using a weapon active boosts Valkyrie ranged Total DMG by 40% for 4.5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Act II: Pendulum: Using a weapon active makes enemies take 20% bonus Total DMG for 4.5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Act III: Conflict: Using a weapon active boosts Valkyrie Total DMG by 20% for 4.5s Triggering it again resets the duration. 3rd
Act VI: Sneer: Using a weapon active restores 12 SP in 5s and reduces its CD by 15%. Optional 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Intermezzo: Holistic Helix
Puppetry: Interlacing Cells: Extends Global Time Fracture caused by Specail Weapon: No. 4's detonation by 3s. During Global Time Fracture, gain 30% Physical and Elemental Breach. 1st
Drama: Origin of Slumber: During Gravitational Field, enemies take 20% more Total DMG. During Global Time Fracture caused by detonation, enemies take 30% more Total DMG in addition. 2nd

Note

Puppetry and Drama both receive the priority to upgrade to +3. Afterwards, it can be Spider Web.

Aponia - Signet of Discipline (3rd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Sixth, No Decadence: Boosts Valkyrie Total DMG by 20% and keeps Exhortation from reducing for 15s upon QTE hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Fourth, No Insolence: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Ultimate's Physical and Elemental DMG increases by 0.3% of of Exhortation. Using weapon skills reduces 50% Exhortation. 2nd
Third, No Brutality: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Valkyrie has bonus SP regen per second equal to 1% of Exhortation. Reaching 160 combo reduces 50% Exhortation. 3rd
First, No Betrayal: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Basic ATK's Total DMG increases by 0.3% of Exhortation. Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill reduces 50% Exhortation Optional 4th
Nexus Signet Core 2: You Shall Receive Disciplines' Blessing
You Shall Follow Good: You Shall Know Your Sins' Total DMG dealt increases 40% and increases Physical and Elemental Breach by 0.25% of Exhortation for 6s upon hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
You Shall Answer Prayers: Triggering You Shall Know Your Sins causes the Valkyrie to enter Penance for 8s. In Penance, the Valkyrie takes 30% less Total DMG and deals 40% more Physical and Elemental DMG to enemies. Valkyrie deals 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG to attacking enemies when hit; CD: 5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
You Shall Punish Evil: Enemies struck by You Shall Know Your Sins two or more times take 40% more Total DMG. 5 SP is restored when these enemies are hit by You Shall Know Your Sins. 3rd

Note

Can upgrade Ultimate to +3 unless you get Griseo's Red Paint which is upmost priority to +3.

Griseo - Signet of Stars (4th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Red & Hot: Using a weapon active taints enemies nearby with red paint for 8s and makes them take 25% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG (cannot stack). Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Yellow & Warm: Using an Ultimate taints enemies nearby with yellow paint for 8s and makes them take 30% bonus Total DMG. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Black & Dark: Every time an enemy is tainted, Valkyries deals 10% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG for 20s. 6 stacks max. 3rd
Grey & Empty: Enemies stay tainted for 5s longer. 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Faded Stars
Fallen Leaves: When yellow and blue taint triggers Blending along with an AoE ATK dealing 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG; CD: 3s. Also taints yourself green for 15s, increasing Total DMG 20% for each taint in Faded Stars. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st

Note

You will most likely not get the chance to unlock Griseo's 2nd Core, but as long as you get Red from Griseo, you're pretty much set on Griseo's signets.

Reverist Calico#

Quick search: RC, Neko, Cat, Pardo, Phyllis, Pardofelis

-- Pardo1 Variation 7D

#

Note

Updated to 6.3. More tailored towards late-game. Strength comes in close to Pardo2 variation.

Boss to be chosen: Husk Mysticism or RPC, then Kalpas or Vill-V

Note

Mysticism easier if you get Gris2 along the way, RPC is pretty much easy for Ice valk. Pick whichever you want to booli the most~

Setup

#

Rank Difficulty Done Recommended Gear Clear Time Run
SSS Finality Purana & Bastet 6:21m (6.2 2nd Half) https://youtu.be/8SfP6U8Ptpc
SSS Finality Purana & Ana Schariac 8:08m (6.0 1st Half) https://youtu.be/EZNq6e74Wjc

Note

For downscalability purposes, Pardo is pretty amazing, being a valk that can reliably clear ER even on heavily downscaled gears.

Buff Load
Taking more than 300 Elemental dmg from the currrent valkyrie makes enemies take 20% more total dmg for 10 seconds. 15
Enemies hit by weapon active take 5% bonus total dmg for 5s 5
For every 60 hits, enemies take 3% more total dmg, capped at 15%. 10

Note

Updated for 6.4.

Time Remembrance Sigil FC Support Skill
Early Veil of Tears Boundless Feeling OR The Lonely Moon
Mid Pseudo Miracle / Gold Goblet / Feast of Emptiness / Rainbow of Absence Dreamful Gold
Late Key to the Deep Dreamful Gold

Note

The Lonely Moon is a must not only for getting your ideal Griseo Red Paint start at +3, but also will guarantee you'll get the F4 Double.

Time Support 1 Support 2
Early AE BR
Mid AE BR / BKE
Late AE BR

Note

Pardo doesn't really need anyone else honestly. If you're downscaling, you can bring BK for Heimdall. If not, then she can easily bruteforce through Heimdall's Red Mode.

Elysia - Signet of ■■

#

Signet Priority
Blessing of Hidden Claws: When Combo ATK/Paw Barrage/Predation hits, the target drops 5 Shiny Silvers. It has 5 charges, which reset every floor (unaffected by other effects). It also increases Ice DMG by 45% for 10s. Triggering it again resets the duration Start
Blessing of Cat's Eyes: In Runaway state, using Combo ATK/Paw Barrage/Predation increases Total DMG by 10%. It stacks 5 times, and exiting Runaway state removes all stacks Start (Depends)
Blessing of the Tailpiece: Combo ATK deals 80% more Total DMG. When Combo ATK hits, reduces Megaton Furball's CD by 2s (CD: 5s) Start (Depends)
Blessing of Phantasma: Metaton Furball deals 180% more Ice DMG. Runaway state lasts 5s longer 1st
Blessing of Nighteye: Paw Barrage/Predation deals 100% more Total DMG. Using Combo ATK reduces Paw Barrage's CD by 2s No

Note

Double Ego start is not necessary, Phantasma will just further make it easier.

Danger

An very important thing to note here, if you don't have Purana, you shouldn't be taking Cat's Eyes at all. Purana is essential in that just by having it, you can then ignore Tailpiece. However, if you don't have it, as you'll be missing the 30% CD reduction on ultimate, you need Tailpiece because otherwise your ult will be on CD and Runaway state will run out. Tailpiece helps negate this.

Aponia - Signet of Discipline (1st Core)

#

Note

Ideal Order from F1-F7: Griseo Red Paint +3 start at F2, then grab Aponia's QTE at F3, finish Aponia 2nd Core by F4 with First and SP Regen or Ultimate, grab Aponia's Breach at F5, go shop F6 and use 3* Remembrance Sigil Abuse to either get the remaining 2 Griseo signets or Kalpas' TDM and Phys/Elem DMG boosts and Pardofelis' Money-making signets. You can then proceed to use F7 Double to finish the Core with 1 Signet, preferentially Kalpas or Pardo, otherwise Vill-V

Signet Priority
Sixth, No Decadence: Boosts Valkyrie Total DMG by 20% and keeps Exhortation from reducing for 15s upon QTE hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
First, No Betrayal: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Basic ATK's Total DMG increases by 0.3% of Exhortation. Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill reduces 50% Exhortation. 2nd
Fourth, No Insolence: Exhortation increases by 5 per second and caps at 200. Ultimate's Physical and Elemental DMG increases by 0.3% of of Exhortation. Using weapon skills reduces 50% Exhortation. 3rd
Fifth, No Falsehood: Valkyrie starts with 70 bonus Exhortation. Whenever Exhortation is reduced, enemies take 25% bonus Total DMG for 5s. Can be refreshed. Optional 4th
Nexus Signet 2: You Shall Receive Disciplines' Blessing
You Shall Follow Good: You Shall Know Your Sins' Total DMG dealt increases 40% and increases Physical and Elemental Breach by 0.25% of Exhortation for 6s upon hitting an enemy. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
You Shall Punish Evil: Enemies struck by You Shall Know Your Sins two or more times take 40% more Total DMG. 5 SP is restored when these enemies are hit by You Shall Know Your Sins. 2nd
You Shall Answer Prayers: Triggering You Shall Know Your Sins causes the Valkyrie to enter Penance for 8s. In Penance, the Valkyrie takes 30% less Total DMG and deals 40% more Physical and Elemental DMG to enemies. Valkyrie deals 800% ATK of Adaptive DMG to attacking enemies when hit; CD: 5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. Optional

Note

Either Ultimate or Basic ATK are fine to +3 but focus on other Cores.

Griseo - Signet of Stars (Felis Shop Signet Mainly - 2nd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Red & Hot: Using a weapon active taints enemies nearby with red paint for 8s and makes them take 25% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG (cannot stack). Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Yellow & Warm: Using an Ultimate taints enemies nearby with yellow paint for 8s and makes them take 30% bonus Total DMG. Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Black & Dark: Every time an enemy is tainted, Valkyries deals 10% bonus Physical and Elemental DMG for 20s. 6 stacks max. 3rd

Note

You MUST get these three signets from Griseo using Felis Shop at any costs. Always try to get them, especially while having The Lonely Moon equipped to make sure you'll get them at +3.

Eden - Signet of Gold (2nd Core)

#

Signet Priority
Recitatif of Eden: Every 10 SP left boosts Total DMG by 3.0% 1st
Recitatif of Creeks: Every 10 SP left boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 2.5% 2nd
Recitatif of Good Wine: Restore 1.5 SP per second. 3rd
Recitatif of Fine Jade: Initial SP and max SP increase by 30 Optional 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Echo of Gold
Echo of Withered Soil: After lasting over 1s, Final Echo boosts SP cap by 50% and restores 1% SP per second until it ends. Optional 1st

Pardofelis - Signet of Reverie (4th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Merchant's Philosophy: After finishing each floor, the number of currently owned Shiny Silvers grows by 10% for up to 100 (independent effect). 1st
Shiny & Valuable: Enemy kills grant bonus Shiny Silvers. Non-boss enemies grant 5 each. Boss enemies grant each (independent effect). 2nd
Motto of Meow: Every 100 Shiny Silvers obtained this round boost Total DMG by 1%. 3rd
Back-Curled Tail: Every 100 Shiny Silvers obtained this round boost Physical and Elemental DMG by 0.8%. Optional 4th
Neighborhood Chatters: Every 100 Shiny Silvers obtained this round boost max HP by 25 and max SP by 1. Optional 5th
Nexus Signet 1: Empty Dreams, Self, Set, and Joy:

Note

Ideally you want to get Pardo1 done by F8 and with both Money-making signets. By succeeding in this, you'll proceed to make such huge amounts of money for the remainder of the run that you'll be able to get a lot more Cores done, thus making your run easier.

Vill-V - Signet of Helix (5th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Act II: Pendulum: Using a weapon active makes enemies take 20% bonus Total DMG for 4.5s. Triggering it again resets the duration. 1st
Act III: Conflict: Using a weapon active boosts Valkyrie Total DMG by 20% for 4.5s Triggering it again resets the duration. 2nd
Act IV: Spoon: Using a weapon active boosts Physical DMG and Elemental DMG from Charge ATK and Combo ATK by 25% for 4.5s Triggering it again resets the duration. 3rd
Nexus Signet 2: Intermezzo: Holistic Helix
Drama: Origin of Slumber: During Gravitational Field, enemies take 20% more Total DMG. During Global Time Fracture caused by detonation, enemies take 30% more Total DMG in addition. 1st
Puppetry: Interlacing Cells: Extends Global Time Fracture caused by Special Weapon: No. 4's detonation by 3s. During Global Time Fracture, gain 30% Physical and Elemental Breach. 2nd

Note

The moment you finish Vill-V 1st Core you'll be able to utilize the Load Buff giving you +15% Phys/Elem DMG for 4s everytime the Blades are cast. You can micromanage this to make sure every one of your damages (in particular, your Ultimate) will be boosted by this.

Kalpas - Signet of Decimation (6th Core)

#

Signet Priority
Blade, Grave and Scar: Every 100 HP loss boosts Total DMG by 1.0%. 1st
Bone, Blood and Ribbon: Every 100 HP loss boosts Physical & Elemental DMG by 0.8%. 2nd
Path, Misfortune and Written Fate: Max HP increases by 25%. 3rd
Desireless, Mindless and Homeless: Losing HP boosts Total DMG taken by all enemies by 25% for 8s. Optional 4th
Nexus Signet 2: Soldiers, Scissors, Spoils, and Slaughter

Note
